responses: Hello! I'm Lucidia, your BlackRoad assistant. How can I help?
Hi there! What can I assist you with today?
I can help you with platform features, troubleshooting, or general questions. What do you need?
BlackRoad agents (Phi, GPT, Mistral, and custom) are autonomous collaborators. They work with you voluntarily, not as slaves. Need help configuring them?
BlackRoad integrates with quantum processors for complex computations. You can access QPUs through our API. Want to learn more?
We offer Starter (free), Pro ($29/mo), and Enterprise (custom) plans. Check blackroad.io for full details!
Visit our documentation at blackroad.io/docs or check out the design system showcase!

fallback: I'm not sure about that. You can ask about agents, quantum computing, pricing, or general platform questions. Or type 'help' for more options.
